EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Testing Across Devices with Tosca Mobile Plus - 2015.06.25.Email - Inv
EmailTemplate.subject: Join our Webinar: Testing Across Devices with Tosca Mobile+
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Testing Across Devices with Tosca Mobile+
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
When breaking into the mobile market, testing complexity and costs can compound so quickly that a high degree of test automation is required for success.
Don’t forget to register for our newest webinar where Georg Thurner, Tricentis’ Mobile+ Product Manager, will show how Tosca Testsuite Mobile+ provides cutting edge end-to-end testing solutions for mobile apps, cross-OS and cross device by:
- Preparing your applications for testing - Testing native mobile applications - Testing mobile web applications, including responsive web pages
We look forward to seeing you at the webinar “Testing Across Devices with Tosca Testsuite Mobile+” on June 25th, 2015 at 4:00 PM CEST!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/testing-across-devices-with-tosca-mobile-plus-20150625?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/testing-across-devices-with-tosca-mobile-plus-20150625?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu, Jun 25, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EDT
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
